Name: Meram Burger
Review Text:
Excellent service...

Shisha was good... Fries were really tasty... ‚Ä¶

Name: Meram Burger
Review Text: Had the most unfriendly and grumpy lady behind the counter ever. She didn't bother to articulate and wasn't at all helpful. Fries are good, but the food is so-so. The falafel burger is literally a bun with falafel balls in it - not a patty. Not really sure why they don't include sauce with the menu.

Name: Meram Burger
Review Text: Best food in Amster for Russian people I think. And it not expansive! Highly recommended

Name: Meram Burger
Review Text: Wauw, I never ate such disgusting food...... It is just a disgrace to the turkish cuisine. The meat hadn't any flavor the adana, kofte and chicken breast tasted more like left overs from the dark ages.

Name: Meram Burger
Review Text:

Review Text: Good place to go with kids as there is a little play area. Good is tasty.

Name: Meram Burger
Review Text: Big homemade burger with crunchy wedge fries. Tasty not like the factory made burger. Bit pricey, but foodwise it‚Äôs fine. Quality always comes with a price plus it‚Äôs quite a trendy interior. Nice for family and young people to hang out

Name: Meram Burger

Name: Meram Burger
Review Text:

Name: Meram Burger
Review Text: We went here as a family. After our reservation we called them to let them know we might be getting late, the phone attendant replied: Is our restaurant aware of your reservation? That was the first thing I was surprised with. ‚Ä¶

Name: Meram Burger
Review Text: Went twice now. It is one of the few places in the area still open around midnight.Very nice interior. Twister fries are good. The burgers are just sad, especialy for that price. Dry, overbaked, tasteless. I am surprised it is still quite busy when I pass by.

Name: Meram Burger
Review Text: Harissa burger and curly fries were AWESOME. Loved the presentation of the food. However the falafal burger was easily the worst I've ever seen in my life :'''( Do not take your vegetarian friends here, they will be very sad!

Name: Meram Burger
Review Text: Had to wait 18 minutes for food. The portions were too small for the price. Got charged for a drink we did not order. But the food was quite good, and descent service. Would visit again.
